price: 27. Ir džinus, Mes sukūrėme kadaise iš bedūmės ugnies liepsnos.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
